about_the_game:
In a galaxy far far away, there was a collection of helmets. Some were stronger than others, some were smaller and some were bigger, but all helmets had a purpose - to protect their space-human and allow them to breath outside of the Universe. The Lonely Helmet, a space-themed puzzle platformer, will have you jumping and sliding through levels after being tasked to find the human that was meant to be wearing you on their head outside the ISS.

Features

  • Single-player
  • 5 Levels in Demo Game
